mapper.select: SELECT pa.`id`, pa.`account_number` accountNumber FROM `person_account` pa
mapper.sql: WHERE TRIM(pa.`city`) = TRIM(#{city}) AND TRIM(pa.`street`) = TRIM(#{street}) AND TRIM(pa.`building_num`) = TRIM(#{buildingNumber}) AND TRIM(pa.`building_corp`) = TRIM(#{buildingCorp}) AND TRIM(pa.`apartment`) = TRIM(#{apartment}) AND TRIM(pa.`first_name`) = TRIM(#{firstName}) AND TRIM(pa.`middle_name`) = TRIM(#{middleName}) AND TRIM(pa.`last_name`) = TRIM(#{lastName}) AND TRIM(pa.`own_num_sr`) = TRIM(#{ownNumSr}) AND pa.`oszn_id` = #{osznId} AND pa.`calc_center_id` = #{calculationCenterId}
mapper.select:
SELECT pa.`id`, pa.`city`, pa.`street`, pa.`building_num` buildingNumber, pa.`building_corp` buildingCorp, pa.`apartment`, pa.`first_name` firstName, pa.`middle_name` middleName, pa.`last_name` lastName, pa.`own_num_sr` ownNumSr, pa.`account_number` accountNumber, IFNULL(oszn_value.`value`, oszn_sys_value.`value`) oszn, IFNULL(calc_value.`value`, calc_sys_value.`value`) calculationCenter FROM `person_account` pa JOIN `organization_attribute` oszn_a ON (oszn_a.`object_id` = pa.`oszn_id` AND oszn_a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND oszn_a.`attribute_type_id` = 900) LEFT JOIN `organization_string_culture` oszn_value ON (oszn_value.`id` = oszn_a.`value_id` AND oszn_value.`locale_id` = #{localeId}) JOIN `organization_string_culture` oszn_sys_value ON (oszn_sys_value.`id` = oszn_a.`value_id` AND oszn_sys_value.`locale_id` = (SELECT l.`id` FROM `locales` l WHERE l.`system` = 1))
JOIN `organization_attribute` calc_a ON (calc_a.`object_id` = pa.`calc_center_id` AND calc_a.`status` = 'ACTIVE' AND calc_a.`attribute_type_id` = 900) LEFT JOIN `organization_string_culture` calc_value ON (calc_value.`id` = calc_a.`value_id` AND calc_value.`locale_id` = #{localeId}) JOIN `organization_string_culture` calc_sys_value ON (calc_sys_value.`id` = calc_a.`value_id` AND calc_sys_value.`locale_id` = (SELECT l.`id` FROM `locales` l WHERE l.`system` = 1))
ORDER BY
oszn_value.`value`
calc_value.`value`
${orderByClause}
ASC
DESC
LIMIT #{start},#{size}

SELECT pa.`id`, pa.`city`, pa.`street`, pa.`building_num` buildingNumber, pa.`building_corp` buildingCorp, pa.`apartment`, pa.`first_name` firstName, pa.`middle_name` middleName, pa.`last_name` lastName, pa.`own_num_sr` ownNumSr, pa.`account_number` accountNumber, pa.`oszn_id` osznId, pa.`calc_center_id` calculationCenterId FROM `person_account` pa WHERE pa.`id` = #{id}
